original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1256)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(931)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>將自身範圍內敵方吸入黑洞造成物理傷害，並恢復 <color=#ccffcc>50%</color> 體力，且在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4350)@</color> 秒內提升 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HPmax(4355)@</color> 點體力上限，同時每秒恢復 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4350)@</color> 點體力。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1256)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(931)@</color> <color=#80cc00>War</color> inhales the enemy within its range into a black hole, causing physical damage and recovering <color=#ccffcc>100%</color> physical strength, and in <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4350) @</color> Use a bigger body to improve in seconds <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HPmax(4355)@</color> Point the upper limit of physical strength, while recovering every second <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4350)@ </color> Some physical strength.
